item.description:
Almost the end of another season of Kennedy Plaza Beer Gardens in Burnside Park. Unfortunately, Rhode Island doesn't have a real Octoberfest anywhere that I've found, so this will have to do. Sit outside, drink beer from Trinity, Socialize with fellow Newcomers and listen to Oom Pa music.

If they do traditional "An Der Wiesen" songs, I'll definitely try and liven things up and teach you what little I know about participating in a German beer festival.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with a blue bike helmet, a bright yellow-orange shirt, and a meetup sign.(sorry, haircut)
item.name: Bier Garten @ Kennedy Plaza with live music by the Oom Pa Pas
